channel.title: How do I run RSC with plain old JDK... [solved]
channel.description:
[s]Hello, I have recently decided to go back to RSC server development I know there is a way because I have done it before, to run the project without having to have apacheant or whatever and just use JDK, It has been a while though and I forgot how I did it the last time. I've been looking all over for how with no luck but I [i]know [/i]it [i]is[/i] possible... If anyone could point me in the right direction that would be very much appreciated. Thank you for reading! ;)[/s]
Edit: Never mind. I just decided to download the ANT program and use that. It wasn't all that hard.

item.title: How do I run RSC with plain old JDK... [solved]
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Hello, I have recently decided to go back to RSC server development I know there is a way because I have done it before, to run the project without having to have apacheant or whatever and just use JDK, It has been a while though and I forgot how I did it the last time. I’ve been looking all over for how with no luck but I know it is possible… If anyone could point me in the right direction that would be very much appreciated. Thank you for reading!

Edit: Never mind. I just decided to download the ANT program and use that. It wasn’t all that hard.
